NK041(di)053:0: bkra shis mchog grub ces bya ba bzhugs so ///
NK041(di)053:1: dbus kyi phyogs na bkra shis lha yi mchog gyur pa //
NK041(di)053:2: dpal ldan rnam par snang mdzad ye shes gangs chen mtsho //
NK041(di)053:3: rtag tu ting 'dzin mi g.yo phyag na 'khor lo bsnams //
NK041(di)053:4: des ni deng 'dir khyod la bkra shis mchog gyur cig /
NK041(di)053:6: shar gyi phyogs na bkra shis lha yi mchog gyur pa //
NK041(di)053:7: bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje bde ba'i mchog /
NK041(di)053:8: bdud bzhi rab tu 'joms mdzad phyag na rdo rje bsnams //
NK041(di)053:9: des ni deng 'dir khyod la bkra shis mchog s+w+aa /
NK041(di)053:10: lho yi phyogs na bkra shis lha yi rgyal ba rin chen 'byung ldan dgos 'dod kun gyi gnas //
NK041(di)053:11: yid bzhin re ba skong bas phyag na rin chen bsnams //
NK041(di)053:12: des ni deng 'dir khyod la +aah nub kyi phyogs na bkra shis lha yi mchog gyur pa //
NK041(di)053:13: bde gshegs snang ba mtha' yas bde ba chen po'i sku //
NK041(di)053:14: kun nas mchog tu yid 'ong phyag na pad+ma bsnams //
NK041(di)053:15: des ni deng 'dir khyod la bkra shis mchog h+aah
NK041(di)053:16: byang gi phyogs na bkra shis lha sangs rgyas don
NK041(di)053:17: yod grub pa phrin las lhun grub dpal //
NK041(di)053:18: thogs med bya ba grub mdzad phyag na ral gri bsnams //
NK041(di)053:19: des ni deng 'dir khyod la bkra shis mchog gyur cig /
NK041(di)053:20: phyag na ut+pala bsnams pa yid 'ong don grub pa //
NK041(di)053:21: gzhon nu'i sku ste nyes pa'i dri ma thams cad spangs //
NK041(di)053:22: 'jig rten kun na dpal gyur thams cad kun kyi dpal //
NK041(di)053:23: 'jam dpal gzhon nus khyod la bkra shis mdzad gyur cig /
NK041(di)053:24: phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa sa gsum mgon gcig pu //
NK041(di)053:25: 'jig dang sdug bsngal kun sel kun tu bde mdzad cing //
NK041(di)053:26: snying rje'i thugs ldan pad+ma rgyas pa'i spyan mnga' ba //
NK041(di)053:27: spyan ras gzigs kyis khyod la phyag na rdo rje bsnams pa bgegs kun mthar byed cing //
NK041(di)053:28: 'bar ba'i me lce can te bdud kyi yul kun sreg /
NK041(di)053:29: 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal srid pa yongs kyi mgon //
NK041(di)053:30: rdo rje 'dzin pas khyod la phyag na klu shing bsnams pa byams pa'i sprin chen gyis //
NK041(di)053:31: mkha' dbyings kun khyab dam chos char chen rtag tu 'bebs //
NK041(di)053:32: dge ba'i lo tog smin pas sa gsum rab dga' ba //
NK041(di)053:33: byams pa mgon pos khyod la phyag na ral gri bsnams pa nam mkha' lta bu'i sku //
NK041(di)053:34: nam mkha'i dbyings kun dri zhim 'od zer d+r+wa bas khyab //
NK041(di)053:35: sdig ltung mun pa kun 'joms phan bde'i snang ba 'gyed //
NK041(di)053:36: nam mkha'i snying pos khyod la phyag na nor bu bsnams pa srid zhi'i dpal gyur sku //
NK041(di)053:37: phun tshogs bde ba'i 'byung gnas yon tan kun gyi sa //
NK041(di)053:38: ma lus 'dod pa thams cad yid bzhin stsol mdzad pa //
NK041(di)053:39: sa yi snying pos khyod la phyag na zla ba bsnams pa nyon mongs gdung sel zhing //
NK041(di)053:40: srid pa'i rab rib kun 'joms sgrib pa'i dri ma sel //
NK041(di)053:41: ye shes snang ba rab sbyin chos kyi char 'bebs pa //
NK041(di)053:42: sgrib kun sel bas khyod la phyag na nyi ma bsnams pa mkha' ltar khyab pa'i sku //
NK041(di)053:43: ye shes snang ba'i 'od zer chos dbyings rgyas par 'gengs //
NK041(di)053:44: sangs rgyas chos dang 'phags pa'i rgyal mtshan mchog gyur pa //
NK041(di)053:45: kun tu bzang pos khyod la bkra shis mdzad gyur cig /
NK041(di)053:46: ma lus chos kun chos kyi dbyings nyid de //
NK041(di)053:47: chos dbyings ji snyed rgyal ba'i ye shes sku //
NK041(di)053:48: kun kyang khyod la dge legs chen po yi //
NK041(di)053:49: dbang bskur dgongs pas bkra shis mdzad gyur cig /
NK041(di)053:50: rigs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba chen mo ni //
NK041(di)053:51: spyan la sogs pas rin chen bum pa nas //
NK041(di)053:52: bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun gtsug tu 'bebs pa yis //
NK041(di)053:53: khyod la deng 'dir bkra shis mchog gyur cig /
NK041(di)053:54: rgyal ba'i sras po phyogs rnams rab grags pa //
NK041(di)053:55: 'jigs med zhi ba'i thugs ldan de dag gis //
NK041(di)053:56: sna tshogs me tog sprin gyi char 'bebs pas //
NK041(di)053:57: khyod la bkra shis dam pa mchog gyur cig /
NK041(di)053:58: rigs kyi sems dpa' mchog tu yid 'ong ba //
NK041(di)053:59: bkra shis lha mo'i tshogs kyis dga' ba'i glu //
NK041(di)053:60: 'jig rten kun tu khyab par bsgrags par yis //
NK041(di)053:61: deng khyod phun sum tshogs pa'i bkra shis shog /
NK041(di)053:62: dus mtha'i me ltar rab 'bar khro bo'i tshogs //
NK041(di)053:63: 'jigs pa'i nga ro dang bcas gar byed cing //
NK041(di)053:64: 'bar ba'i lta bas bgegs rnams mthar byed pas //
NK041(di)053:65: deng 'dir khyod la bkra shis mchog gyur cig /
NK041(di)053:66: rigs kyi bka' nyan 'jig rten skyong ba'i tshogs //
NK041(di)053:67: phyogs bcu kun nas sprin bzhin gtibs byas te //
NK041(di)053:68: bkra shis mchod pa'i yo byad sna tshogs kyis //
NK041(di)053:69: deng 'dir khyod la bkra shis spel gyur cig /
NK041(di)053:70: yid la ji ltar bsam pa'i don grub cing //
NK041(di)053:71: srid zhi'i dpal yon kun nas phun sum tshogs //
NK041(di)053:72: dpal ldan rgyal ba'i 'byor pa rmad byung des //
NK041(di)053:73: khyod la rtag tu bkra shis mchog gyur cig /
NK041(di)053:74: 'gro dang bya ba brtsam sogs la //
NK041(di)053:75: thog mar dran na don grub cing //
NK041(di)053:76: dus su yid la byas pa yis //
NK041(di)053:77: dpal ni phun sum tshogs pa thob //
NK041(di)053:78: 'jam dpal mchog sbyin rdo rje'i ut+pala yid la byas
NK041(di)053:79: pa'i rkyen las chu 'brug zla ba 2tshes 5la 'jam
